hopobject.name: Plan 9 OS
hopobject.pname: Porting Plan 9 OS to Beagle Board
hopobject.body: The porting will involve writing machine specific code of kernel and specifically working on getting the peripherals working like flash, sd card, usb etc.
hopobject.shortdesc: Plan 9 is a distributed operating system developed by bell labs which proposes interesting ideas ( http://plan9.bell-labs.com/ ).The goal is to port it to the beagle board and possibly adding bluetooth driver to plan 9.
